import React,{useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Home = props => { const[cart, setCart]=useState([]); const PAGE_PRODUCTS="products"; const PAGE_CART="cart"; const[page, setPage]=useState(PAGE_PRODUCTS); const navigateTo=(nextpage)=>{ setPage(nextpage); } const addToCart=(id)=>{ const check=cart.every(ga=>{ return ga.id !==id; }) if(check){ const data=props.products.filter(pr=>{ return pr.id===id; }) setCart([...cart,...data]); props.onAdd(cart); } else( alert("sản phẩm đã có trong giỏ hàng") ) } const renderProducts=()=>( <>
{/* product list item start */} {/* product item list end */} { props.products.map(value=>{ return (
